title: PM offers condolence over Sardar Balkh Sher Mazari’s demise
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 23 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday visited the residence of Riaz Mahmood Khan Mazari, a member of the National Assembly, and offered condolence over the death of his father, former caretaker prime minister Sardar Balakh Sher Mazari.
The prime minister prayed for the high ranks of the departed soul.
He observed that late Mazari’s contributions for the country were peerless which would be remembered for long.
